creator: nakamura@zyuon.co.jp
nakamura@zyuon.co.jp
text:
Sorry,The title and content I reported was not suitable.

Servlet's SessionTimeOut occurres before the
 expected time in rare condition.

-- sample
SessionTimeOut:5 min(in web.xml or 
 HttpSession.setMaxInactiveInterval(). 
)
10:00 first access.(session created)
10:03 second access.
10:05 session invalidated!(notified by HttpSessionBindingEvent)
--

I think, org.apache.tomcat.util.threads.Expirer uses 
TimeStamp.getLastAccessTime() incorrectly. 
 Expirer must use TimeStamp's "thisAccessedTime" field 
instead of "lastAccessedTime" in method,"runIt".

creator: william.barker@wilshire.com
text: Fixed now in the CVS, and will appear in the next nightly.
